readable.title: 1290894194_8a4ffdc7eb
readable.content: A woman crouches down next to her terrier dog to smile at a little girl sitting on the sidewalk . A woman in a red top and a small dog talks to a young girl . A woman showing a small dog to an infant A woman squatting to face a small child while holding a dog . a woman with a brown dog is talking to a toddler who is sat on the ground .
